Package com.w10.risk_game.models

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w10.risk_game.models.GameMap
  • public class GameMap
extends Object
    The GameMap class represents a game map that contains countries, continents, and players, and provides methods for accessing and manipulating these objects.
    Author:
    Omnia Alam, Darlene-Naz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Map<Integer,​Continent> d_continents  
      private Map<Integer,​Country> d_countries  
      private Map<Integer,​Player> d_player  
      private static LogEntryBuffer Logger  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameMap()
      This constructor initializes the `d_countries`, `d_continents`, and `d_player` variables as empty HashMaps.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameMap

        public GameMap()
        This constructor initializes the `d_countries`, `d_continents`, and `d_player` variables as empty HashMaps. These HashMaps will be used to store the countries, continents, and players in the game map.

        public boolean isMapCreated()
        The function checks if a map has been created by verifying if there are continents and countries present.
